channel.description: Recent content in Meetups on cgimeno

item.title: Mad4Hacking meetup: Introduction to Openstack
item.description: Last friday I was invited by Mad4Hacking to a Meetup cycle about virtualization. In my session, I have the opportunity to talk about OpenStack and related technologies, like Ceph. If you want to take a look into you can find the slides here. See you in the next meetup!
